schemaVersion.description: Version of the SGCI Resource Descriptions schema used for this description.

host.description: Network addressable name (hostname) serving as a unique identifier for the resource across all SGCI resource descriptions.

name.description: Human-readable, displayable name for the resource

resourceName.description: Human-readable, displayable name for the resource

hostName.description: label assigned to identify the device as an internet point of access

dirPath.description: the general form of the name of a file or directory, it specifies a unique location in the file system

connectionDefinition.description: The connection object defines all parameters required to establish a connection with the resource

connectionProtocol.description: Communication protocol required to establish a connection with the resource

securityProtocol.description: Cryptographic or access protocol enabled to access the resource

host.description: Communication endpoint host (if omitted, the top level host of this resource is used)

proxyHost.description: The ProxyHost object includes details required to connect to the proxy tunneling

proxyPort.description: Communication endpoint required by the proxy

storageDefinition.description: The storage object is used to describe storage properties of the resource. All resources in the SGCI Resource Catalog are assumed to provide storage facilities, and as such, All resource descriptions must include values for the storage properties.

storageType.description: High-level category to which this storage resource belongs. Determines additional properties that can be provided.

connections.description: The connection objects indicate available methods for accessing the resource.

fileSystems.description: The fileSystem objects containing information about the paths available on the storage resource.

defaultQuota.description: The defaultQuota object includes quota information about the available storage per

fileSystemDefinition.description: The fileSystem object contains information about the paths available on the storage resource.

mountDir.description: The path on the resource where the fileSystem is mounted.

homeDir.description: The path on the resource serving as the base for user specific home directories.

scratchDir.description: The path on the resource serving as the base for the SCRATCH file system, typically non-shared storage where running jobs should direct their I/O while executing.

workDir.description: The path on the resource serving as the base for the WORK file system, typically shared storage where files are staged before being copied to SCRATCH.

capacity.description: The capacity object describes the total available storage on the fileSystem.

totalBytes.description: The total bytes of storage available on the fileSystem.

computeDefinition.description: The Compute Resource Object is used to describe computational properties of the resource. Not all resources in the SGCI Resource Catalog are assumed to provide compute facilities.

schedulerType.description: Job scheduler configured on the resource

connections.description: The connection objects indicate available methods for accessing the resource.

executionCommands.description: This list defines all the commands required to execute any command on the resource

batchSystem.description: The batchSystem object lists all parameters required by the batch scheduler system

forkSystem.description: The forkSystem object lists all parameters required by the fork scheduler system

executionCommandDefinition.description: The execution Command Object describes how a commnad should be executed on the resource

commandType.description: label that describe the type of command supported by the resource

commandPrefix.description: command to be preappend to the command in order to be executed as the commandType, e.g mpi->mpirun

moduleDependencies.description: list of modules to be loaded before execution of the command

jobManager.description: Job scheduler software installed on the resource no handle job requests

commandPaths.description: List of commands supported by the Batch System

partitions.description: List of public partitions and queues installed on the Batch System

name.description: Label that defines the operation supported by the system

path.description: Complete path to the command that executes the operation

name.description: This label represents a partition of hardware for the resource, typically a queue or partition in the job scheduler

submitArgs.description: Arguments required to request this partition of hardware (if omitted, '-p PARTITION_NAME' or '-q PARTITION_NAME' is used, depending on the job scheduler)

totalNodes.description: Number of available nodes on this partition / queue

nodeHardware.description: The nodeHardware object includes detailed information of the node

computeQuotas.description: queues or partition may have multiple restriction on the jobs allowed to run

minJobsTotal.description: Minimum number of allowed jobs actively running on the partition

maxJobsTotal.description: Maximum number of allowed jobs actively running on the partition

minJobsPerUser.description: Minimum number of allowed jobs actively running on the partition for a user

maxJobsPerUser.description: Maximum number of allowed jobs actively running on the partition for a user

minNodesPerJob.description: Minimum number of nodes allowed to be used by a job

maxNodesPerJob.description: Maximum number of nodes allowed to be used by a job

minTimePerJob.description: Minimum time a job can run without been killed

maxTimePerJob.description: Maximum time a job can run without been killed

minMemoryPerJob.description: Minimum memory allocated for a job

maxMemoryPerJob.description: Maximum memory allocated for a job

minCPUsPerJob.description: Minimum number of cpus allowed to be used by a job

maxCPUsPerJob.description: Maximum number of cpus allowed to be used by a job

minGPUsPerJob.description: Minimum number of gpus allowed to be used by a job

maxGPUsPerJob.description: Maximum number of gpus allowed to be used by a job

minCPUsPerNode.description: Minimum number of cpus allowed to be requested for a node

maxCPUsPerNode.description: Maximum number of cpus allowed to be requested for a node

version.description: Version of OS installed on the resource

nodeHardware.description: NodeHardware object contains details about the software installed on the resource

cpuType.description: Type of cpus installed on the resource

cpuCount.description: Total number of cpus available on the resource

gpuType.description: Type of gpus installed on the resource

gpuCount.description: Total number of gpus available on the resource

memoryType.description: Type of memory installed on the resource

memorySize.description: Total memory available on the resource
